title: Question about suspension.
body: Hey so I was 2 week banned a few month ago and I learned my lesson and kinda shaped up however I was told that if I got any other form of restriction it was going to be a perma ban, I messed up last game and called 2 of my teammates r%%%%%ed for literally inting my lane and then proceeded to get flamed all game by the 3 man queue in flex so with me saying that I got 10 game chat restricted I'm not complaining by any means im just confused as to why I did not receive a permaban and I was wondering if I finish these 10 games before end of season am I still eligible for rewards since I was unbanned August 13th

replies.body: Since this accounts last punishment was on 7/10, you'll still be eligible for rewards. Although, keep in mind that any suspension lasting more than 7 days after 8/22 *will* disqualify your account.
